price: ឱបណ្ដាអ្នកដែលមានជំនឿ. ចូរពួកអ្នករំលឹកចំពោះ អល់ឡោះឱ្យបានច្រើន។
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ ٱذۡكُرُواْ ٱللَّهَ ذِكۡرٗا كَثِيرٗا

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū udh'kurū al-laha dhik'ran kathīran
